def_cn: (房间等建筑物内的)固定装置，固定设施
def_en: Fixtures are pieces of furniture or equipment, for example baths and sinks, which are fixed inside a house or other building and which stay there if you move.

def_cn: (定期举行的)体育活动，体育赛事
def_en: A fixture is a sports event which takes place on a particular date.
If you describe someone or something as a fixture in a particular place or occasion, you mean that they always seem to be there.
